pages.text: Ne bakanile imbakha nobachelasilia , Abandu bolukongo olwa betselwa nende Abarumwa
Olwa khwabarumila babili, nibabayingasia mana nikhubametela owakhataru nibaboola mbu: “ toto efwe khurumilwe khinywe.”
Nibaboola mbu: “enywe mulisa Abandu shinga efwe, ne (Nyasaye) Omunji Wetsimbabaasi shiyeshiakhwo shiosi shiosi tawe, ne enywe mukatinjia butswa.”
Baboola mbu: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi amanyile mbu efwe toto khurumilwe khwinywe
Nekhubula elindi tawe halali okhusia likhuwa lili habulafu
Baboola mbu: “efwe khubekongola nimulalekhana ninafu tawe khulabalasa amachina ne mulanyoola eshinyasio eshikhongo okhurula khwifwe.”
Baboola mbu : “obubii bwenyu buli khwinywe, Shichila okhwitsulisibwa butswa, nohomba enywe muli Abandu babura eshichelo?”
Mana Omundu mulala niyetsa okhurula mumbeka wolukongo nayuukanga naboola mbu: “enywe Abandu banje muloonde Abarumwa bano.”
Muloonde balia abalabasaba omurungo tawe, nabo abeene nabalunjifu
Ne khulwa shina ndalalaama ulia wanoonga ne ewuwe namulikalusibwa
Koo endiile Abanyasaye bandi balali Ye. Omunji wetsimbabaasi niyanyenyela amabii okhusaba khwenyu shikhukhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe nohomba shibakhahabina tawe
Toto mana esie endio emba endi mubukori bwa habulafu
Toto esie usuubiile khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi kho murechelesie
Naboolelwa mbu ; “injila mwikulu,” naboola mbu : “ Abayie Abandu banje bamanyanga khwo
Shingala Nyasaye wanje Omulesi yandesheele mana niyanda mubalia boluyali.”
